headline: DuPont and Qnity to Webcast Investor Days
summary: On Thursday, September 18, 2025 starting at 9:00 a.m. ET, DuPont (NYSE: DD) will host a live video webcast of its Investor Day introducing the future DuPont company after the intended separation of Qnity Electronics, Inc. ("Qnity")*. Also on Thursday, September 18, 2025, starting at 2:00 p.m. ET, Qnity will host a live video webcast of its Investor Day introducing the future standalone, public company. Both Investor Days will include management presentations and a Q&A session.

headline: DuPont to divest Kevlar, Nomex business for $1.8B
summary: The company is selling its aramids business to chemical manufacturer Arclin as it shifts its focus in preparation to spin off Qnity Electronics by Nov. 1.
